attributes.action: Pass legislation to prohibit banks from charging disproportionate amounts of money in bank charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Banks should not be allowed to charge £40 for a returned direct debit. The most the banks have to pay in administration fees is about £1 as most of these systems are automated. Even the most labour intensive administration work (which happens to be bounced cheques) only takes up about £4 worth of costs. 

It does not cost £15 to be sent a letter saying that you went over your overdraft limit by £2.

Banks have been abusing their power for too long.
